TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MailEventNotificationInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 将关于当前事件通知的信息提供给 对象。

span.span: Provides information to the object about the current event notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当发生事件通知时，此类用于将信息传递给对象的电子邮件模板 。This class is used to pass information to the email template for a object when an event notification occurs. 然后，电子邮件模板会设置电子邮件正文的事件信息的格式。The email template then formats the event information for the email message body. 如果禁用了缓冲，事件缓冲系统将发出累积事件的消息，或者事件发生且事件缓冲系统被禁用，则会出现通知。A notification occurs when buffering is disabled, the event-buffering system sends out messages for accumulated events, or an event occurs and the event-buffering system is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Events As WebBaseEventCollection

summary.span: 获取当前消息的事件的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of events for the current message.
A of events for the current message.

public: property int EventsDiscardedByBuffer { int get(); };

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取自上次通知以来被缓冲区丢弃的事件数。

span.span: Gets the number of events discarded by the buffer since the last notification.

value.span: 自上次通知以来被缓冲区丢弃的事件数。

span.span: The number of events discarded by the buffer since the last notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果自上次通知以来缓冲区已重载，则将放弃事件。Events are discarded if the buffer has overloaded since the last notification.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventsDiscardedDueToMessageLimit As Integer
public: property int EventsDiscardedDueToMessageLimit { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取因为缓冲区已超出当前通知的消息上限而被缓冲区丢弃的事件数。

span.span: Gets the number of events that are discarded by the buffer because the buffer has exceeded the message limit for the current notification.

value.span: 因为缓冲区已超出当前通知的消息上限而被缓冲区丢弃的事件数。

span.span: The number of events discarded by the buffer because the buffer has exceeded the message limit for the current notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息限制指定在单个通知期间发送的最大消息数，即每个通知的最大消息数乘以每条消息允许的最大事件数。The message limit specifies the maximum number of messages that are sent during a single notification, which is the maximum number of messages per notification multiplied by the maximum number of events allowed per message. 这些值由 `maxEventsPerMessage` 和 `maxMessagesPerNotification` 配置文件中节的相应提供程序子节中的属性指定 `healthMonitoring` 。These values are specified by the `maxEventsPerMessage` and the `maxMessagesPerNotification` attributes in the appropriate provider sub-section of the `healthMonitoring` section in a configuration file. 事件缓冲系统发送累积事件的消息时，会发生通知。A notification occurs when the event-buffering system sends out messages for accumulated events. 出现这种情况的原因可能是：缓冲区已积累了允许的最大事件数，因为发送事件之间的时间间隔已过期，或者运行状况监视系统请求了缓冲区刷新。This may occur because the buffer has accumulated the maximum allowed number of events, because the time interval between sending events has expired, or because the health-monitoring system has requested a buffer flush. 整个事件缓冲区会根据值，尽可能少的消息发送给收件人 `maxEventsPerMessage` 。The entire event buffer is sent to the recipients in as few messages as possible, based on the `maxEventsPerMessage` value. 缓冲区设置是在配置文件的节的子节中指定的 `bufferModes` `healthMonitoring` 。Buffer settings are specified in the `bufferModes` subsection of the `healthMonitoring` section in a configuration file.

public: property int EventsInBuffer { int get(); };

span.span: Gets the number of events remaining in the buffer after the current notification.

span.span: The number of events remaining in the buffer after the current notification.

summary.span: 获取正在为当前通知处理的事件数。

span.span: Gets the number of events being processed for the current notification.

value.span: 正在为当前通知处理的事件数。

span.span: The number of events being processed for the current notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此计数仅包括当前通知的事件，不包括缓冲区丢弃的事件或由于消息限制而排除的事件。This count only includes events for the current notification and does not include events dropped by the buffer or excluded because of the message limit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供的对象已完成，但消息正文除外，后者是模板创建的部分。The object provided by this property is complete except for the message body, which is the part the template creates. 如果适合，模板可以修改对象的值 。The template can modify the values of the object, if appropriate.
